attributes.action: Reunite Children in UK whose their parents have been separated due to deportation
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of children in UK have been separated from their parents due to deportation or immigration removal and as a result these children are without adequate care and love and later become a menace to society as a whole, my recent observation is that people who commit or want to commit an act of terrorism in the UK are mostly people who grow up in Uk society without parental guidance
